Class Odometer

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • Project.Odometer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class Odometer
extends java.lang.Thread
    implements simple odometry using the motor's tachometers
    Version:
    2.0, 25 Nov 2015
    Author:
    DPM TEAM18
